text: Hey all, I’m building a UI team for @Crowdstrike in London, based out of the lovely 54b. In short you get to build tools to help find hackers, it’s fun work and a bit out of the ordinary. Looking for both junior <http://j.mp/cs-ui-jnr|j.mp/cs-ui-jnr> and senior Ember devs <http://j.mp/cs-ui-snr|j.mp/cs-ui-snr> . Bounties for successful referrals if you know anyone not on here who might be interested.
